translation.en: [reporter on TV] We have breaking news.
It happened just a few moments ago, apparently.
translation.zh: 这显然是几分钟前发生的

translation.en: We have very little information available.
translation.zh: 我们所掌握的信息很少

translation.en: We are-- We have , I understand, an eyewitness on the phone right now.
translation.zh: 我们现在与目击者进行电话连线

translation.en: [reporter on TV] …in the middle of the plaza at 8:52.
translation.zh: …在大厦中央 时间是8点52分

translation.en: With limited information at this point,
we don’t know about injuries in the building…
translation.zh: 我们尚不确定大楼内的伤亡人数

（突发新闻
上海死亡人数不可估量） -发生了什么事？
-好像是

translation.en: -[man on TV] There was a loud sound… -Rog, I got to, uh…
translation.zh:
-发出巨大的响声…
-罗杰 我赶时间

translation.en: I can only describe it as it sounded like…
translation.zh: 我只能说那声音听起来像导弹

translation.en: Then there was a loud explosion and…
[announcer over PA] So, the Red Sox with two down on a base hit.
Your hands are disgusting. Let me do it.
translation.zh: 你的手好恶心 让我来吧

translation.en: [announcer] He pops that one up down the line.
translation.zh: 他以高弓形轨迹击中球

translation.en: It's ducking in! It falls in!
You got it, you got it, you got it! Dive, dive, dive!

translation.zh: 现在我们要第三次击球了

-带来两次出局的伤害…
-该死的

translation.en: [man 1] All right, folks. That’s the game.
translation.zh: 好的 各位 球赛结束了

translation.en: Why don’t we all-- Why don't we all head to our cars, okay?
-I don’t know what that was. -I’m gonna take the kids home, okay?
translation.zh:
-我不知道那是什么
-我先把孩子们送回家 好吗？

translation.en: Okay, yeah. My truck’s up on Main Street, so…
translation.zh: 好的 我的卡车停在大街上

translation.en: Okay. All right, everybody in. Let’s go.
translation.zh: 好的 大家快上车 走吧
好的 直接回家 知道吗 李？

translation.en: -[Emmett] Hey. You all right? -[Lee] Yeah, good.
Your brother say anything going on at the base?
translation.zh: 你兄弟有说军事基地发生什么事吗？

translation.en: He just called. Let me call him back.
translation.zh: 他刚打来 我给他回电话吧

translation.en: [Lee] All right. Yeah, let me know.

translation.zh:
-我的卡车就停在前面
-别担心
罗尼 发生什么事了？

translation.en: We got units headed out there now, EMS and fire.
translation.zh: 急救医疗队和消防队正前往事发地点

-在什么地方？
-瓦克的农场附近

translation.en: [Evelyn] It’s okay, honey. It’s okay, honey bunny.
It’s okay. It’s okay. We’re okay. We’re okay.
-That’s Dad. That’s Dad! Dad! Dad! Dad! -Where, where, where?
We were on Main Street, and-- I don’t--
translation.zh: 我们刚刚在大街上 接着…我不知道

translation.en: [man crying softly] Our Father, who art in heaven,
-hallowed be thy name. -[creature growling at a distance]
Thy kingdom come, thy will be done, on earth as it is in heaven.
translation.zh:
祈求你的天国降临到人间
你的旨意能在人间贯彻 如同在天上

translation.en: [weeping] Give us this day our daily--
translation.zh: 祈求你赐给我们每日必备的粮食

translation.en: I'm going back in. Stay here.
translation.zh: 我进去 你留在这里

translation.en: I don’t know why you came all the way up here, but you can’t stay.
translation.zh:
我不知道你们为何要往上走到这里
但你们不能留下

-往上走？
-这里没有足够的食物
也没有足够的水 这里什么也不充足

translation.en: How do you know we traveled up?
translation.zh: 你怎么知道我们是往上走来？

translation.en: There’s nothing I can do. You won’t survive.
translation.zh:
我也无能为力
你们无法在这里生存下去
拜托 我真的爱莫能助
这里有近一米厚的混凝土

translation.en: They’d have to be right above us to hear.
translation.zh: 它们得在我们的正上方才听得见

translation.en: What is it? Some kind of…
Some kind of feedback from the microphone?
translation.zh: 是麦克风发出的回授电波？

translation.en: It just works. I don’t know.
translation.zh: 我也不清楚 但这确实行得通

translation.en: Just never seen one dead before.
Well, it didn’t reach the bone.

translation.zh: 但那个包扎耐不了多久

-我猜想他们已经…
-就在那一天

translation.en: Held out as long as we could in the house.
translation.zh: 我们在屋子里一直撑着

translation.en: It was when she started screaming…
translation.zh: 就在那时 她开始尖叫
你们这么做是明智之举

translation.en: Can I ask you a question?
did you know it was him?
translation.zh: 你知道是他发出的信号吗？

translation.en: And did you ever think to come for us?
They’re not a kind of people worth saving.
translation.zh: 这类人都不值得被拯救
不可能 爸爸肯定也会听到的

translation.en: It’s the same song. It’s been playing over and over the last four months.
translation.zh: 是同一首歌 过去四个月一直播放着

translation.en: You're lying! My dad used the radio every day!
translation.zh: 你骗人！我爸爸每天都会开收音机！

translation.en: -What’s she saying? -She thinks he would’ve heard it.
translation.zh:
-她说什么？
-她认为他肯定会听到

translation.en: It’s the valley. I tried the radio from our house too,
translation.zh:
山谷里接收不到
我在家中开收音机也听不到

translation.en: but we never heard anything until we got up here.
translation.zh: 我们上到这里来时才听到

translation.en: Your dad was never gonna make it work.
[Marcus] Does this mean that there are more people?
translation.zh: 这是否意味着外面还有很多人？

translation.en: There’s nothing left. I told you, there is nothing left.
translation.zh:
这里什么也不剩
我说过什么也不剩了

translation.en: It's not a song. On the radio. "Beyond the Sea."
translation.zh:
那不是一首歌 收音机播放的
《在汪洋的那一处》

translation.en: They're telling us where to look.
I looked up the radio station where the song is coming from.
translation.zh:
我查过广播电台的位置
那首歌是从那里播放的

translation.en: I can follow the train tracks.
Then I can find a boat--
If I can find the song, where it's coming from,
translation.zh: 我若能找出那首歌的播放位置
由广播发送至每台收音机！

translation.en: Mom will never let you go.

translation.zh: 妈妈…我会把这件事告诉她
因为换做是爸爸也会这么做

translation.en: And look what happened to him.
You have to find her for me.
and I need you to go and find her for me, and bring her back to me. [sobs]
-All right, listen to me. -Please, Emmett, I’m begging you.
translation.zh:
-好了 听我说
-埃默特 算是我求你

translation.en: -No, Evelyn-- Please, please. -I’m begging you. We were friends.
translation.zh:
-艾芙琳
-我求你 我们曾是朋友

translation.en: It’s a shame because if he were here…
translation.zh: 那真是可惜 因为他若还在这里

translation.en: he’d look you right in the eye, and he’d tell you
translation.zh: 他会直视你的双眼并告诉你

translation.en: that his little girl is absolutely the kind of person worth saving.
translation.zh: 他的女儿很值得被拯救

translation.en: and bring her back to me.
We stay here until they’re gone, and then we go.
translation.zh: 我们留在这里等待它们离去

translation.en: We’ll wait here until they’re gone.
translation.zh: 我们在这里等待它们离去
清楚地念出每个字 还记得吗？

translation.en: They… they heard the shot. Okay?
translation.zh: 它们听到了枪声 知道吗？

translation.en: Do not talk about my wife!
You said that you could not do enough.
translation.zh: 你说过你没能为她做更多
你现在有机会这么做了

translation.en: -But the baby, I don't know how-- -I showed you how to do it.
translation.zh: 但我不懂得如何照顾宝宝 我教过你了
听我说 我要是不去

translation.en: soon you will be in a lot of pain.
translation.zh: 再过不久 你的伤口会剧痛难忍
我到时候也不知道该如何帮助你

translation.en: I’m not sure anyone here can actually believe it.
translation.zh:
我想这里所有人
也无法相信还有生存者

translation.en: I think most people had finally given up hope.

translation.zh: 我们已经好久没见过其他人

translation.en: We got here the same way as you.
translation.zh: 我们用了同样的方式来到这里

translation.en: We were in the city when we heard the hurricane sirens.
translation.zh: 我们当时在市区内听到飓风警报

translation.en: Once they knew they couldn’t swim…
translation.zh: 一旦发现它们不会游水

translation.en: the National Guard were told to start loading people onto boats.
translation.zh: 国民警卫便被告知把市民全都推上船

translation.en: Any boat that they could find.
translation.zh: 他们能找到的任何一艘船

translation.en: So, as soon as people saw the first one get out safe…
translation.zh: 大家看到安全离开的第一艘船
每个人都开始争先恐后

translation.en: And that’s when they started screaming.
translation.zh: 大家的喧扰声把它们引来了

translation.en: They had 12 boats lined up on the dock that day.
translation.zh: 在那天 码头上并排了12艘船
不管怎样 你现在也来到这里了

translation.en: And where are you coming from?
Ah, just over the Appalachian ridge.
And how long did it take?
Uh, he said he’ll do it.
Hey, door’s locked. You got a key?
translation.zh: 门被锁上了 你有钥匙吗？

translation.en: We went too fast. What if we lost it?
translation.zh:
我们开太快了
要是让它跟丢了怎么办？
我的天啊 它绕回去了！

translation.en: -No, no, no. All right. Listen to me. -My family.
translation.zh:
-不 好吧 你听我说
-我的家人

translation.en: I have to get back to my family.
